# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${FFTW3_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GSL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${HDF5_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${OPENCV21_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${OPENCV22_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${RMF_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${FFTW3_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${GSL_LINK_PATH}
        ${HDF5_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${OPENCV21_LINK_PATH}
        ${OPENCV22_LINK_PATH}
        ${RMF_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${EM2D_CXX_FLAGS}")


File(GLOB runtimepytests "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/em2d/test_*.py")
set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_align2d.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_argminmax.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_buildxlinks.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_clustering_of_models.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_collision_cross_section.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_csv_related.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_database.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_domino_filters.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_em2d_restraint.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_fft_operations.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_images_opencv.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_project.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_projection_registration.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_registration_results.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_relative_mover.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_rigid_bodies_image_fit.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_sampling.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_segmentation_routines.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_selection_files.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/em2d/test/test_solutions_io.py )

foreach (test ${runtimepyttests} ${pytests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
  add_test("${name}_em2d" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/imppy.sh "python" ${test})
  set_tests_properties("${name}_em2d" PROPERTIES LABELS em2d)
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests  )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("${name}_em2d" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("${name}_em2d"     imp_em2d
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY} ${IMP_GSL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY} ${IMP_STATISTICS_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY} ${IMP_EM_LIBRARY} ${IMP_RMF_LIBRARY} ${IMP_DOMINO_LIBRARY}
    ${FFTW3_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${OPENCV21_LIBRARIES} ${OPENCV22_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES} ${GSL_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES} ${RMF_LIBRARIES} ${HDF5_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("${name}_em2d" PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/em2d/")
   add_test("${name}_em2d" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/imppy.sh "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/em2d/${name}")
   set_tests_properties("${name}_em2d" PROPERTIES LABELS em2d)
endforeach(test)
